prompt:
Nurse: Wonderful. I see on your chart that you are currently taking Plavix 75 mg once a day. As per the instructions, you were told to stop this medication 7 days prior to the procedure. Have you already stopped taking Plavix?

Patient: Yes. Yes. Wait. Plavix.

Nurse: Yes, Plavix. You've confirmed that you've stopped taking it, correct?

Patient: Have I started

Nurse: I apologize for any confusion.

Patient: Hold on. Let me review my medications because I have so many. That I need to take a look at it.

Nurse: Of course, take your time. It's important to be sure about your medications.

Patient: Give me just a second.

responses.gpt4: Of course, take all the time you need. Remember, it's crucial we get this right for your upcoming procedure. Let me know when you have had a chance to review your medications.
responses.our_model: Of course, take your time. It's essential to be sure about your medications.
